kreport.name: szForecloseRateBill

condition.name: orgname
condition.extend: {深圳分部:深圳分部,sz业务支持中心:sz业务支持中心}

condition.name: type
condition.extend: {直接回单:直接回单,在途单:在途单,转派单:转派单}

data.tbody: ${0} ${1} ${2} ${3} ${4} ${5} ${6} ${7}

kreport.ksql: --深圳预处理清单 select fi.executergrouporgname 首派部门, co.serialno 工单编号, co.title 工单标题, co.gendate 报障时间, co.organiger 报障人, co.organigerdept 报障部门, decode(fi.executergrouporgid,co.executergrouporgid,decode(co.isc,1,'直接回单','在途单'),'转派单') 分类 from ( select f.flowlsh,n.executergrouporgid,n.executergrouporgname, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY n.flowlsh ORDER BY n.gendate) rn from rec_flow f,rec_node n where f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and f.flowcode='86b47b100a11226801c8c29cc4f3df3f' --故障管理流程 and n.nodecode in ( '8705e3d30a112268006ecb0498438858', --IT分部接口 '8706e7770a11226800104dac10cfa517', --业务支持中心接口 '95e87c590a112268017f3be1d42c0688', --省IT中心科室处理 '8707d5ab0a112268006fa804cb1cbc30' --厂家处理 ) #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate< ${endDate}] ) fi, ( select f.flowlsh,f.serialno,f.title,f.gendate,i.organiger,i.organigerdept, strcat(distinct n.executergrouporgid) executergrouporgid, decode(i.fualtstatus,'230',1,'240',1,'250',1,0) isc from rec_flow f,rec_node n,ins_frm_fault i where f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and f.flowlsh=i.flowlsh and f.flowcode='86b47b100a11226801c8c29cc4f3df3f' --故障管理流程 and n.nodecode in ( '8705e3d30a112268006ecb0498438858', --IT分部接口 '8706e7770a11226800104dac10cfa517', --业务支持中心接口 '95e87c590a112268017f3be1d42c0688', --省IT中心科室处理 '8707d5ab0a112268006fa804cb1cbc30' --厂家处理 ) and n.executergrouporgid in (select r.value from sec_rank r where r.type in ('厂家','分部','科室','业支','外系统')) #[and f.gendate>=${startDate}] #[and f.gendate< ${endDate}] group by f.flowlsh,f.serialno,f.title,f.gendate,i.organiger,i.organigerdept,decode(i.fualtstatus,'230',1,'240',1,'250',1,0) ) co where fi.flowlsh=co.flowlsh and fi.rn=1 and fi.executergrouporgid in ('8a92635521a51e8f0121a52a528d2998','8a92635521a51e8f0121a5212d8f032e') #[and decode(fi.executergrouporgid,co.executergrouporgid,decode(co.isc,1,'直接回单','在途单'),'转派单')=${type}] #[and instr(co.executergrouporgid,'8a92635521a51e8f0121a52a528d2998')>0 --${blowoverYZ}] #[and fi.executergrouporgname=${orgname}] order by co.gendate
